metadata.name: halo_protocol
metadata.description: Solana Anchor smart contract for ROSCA circles

accounts.name: circle
docs: Circle account to get escrow reference

accounts.name: escrow
docs: Escrow account that holds member stakes

accounts.name: escrow_token_account
docs: Token account holding the escrowed funds

accounts.name: treasury_token_account
docs: Treasury token account to receive fees

accounts.name: authority
docs: Authority that can collect management fees (should be automated/governance)

accounts.name: authority
docs: Authority that controls the source tokens (e.g., Solend integration service)

accounts.name: source_token_account
docs: Source token account containing yield to distribute

accounts.name: recipient_token_account
docs: Recipient token account to receive net yield

accounts.name: treasury_token_account
docs: Treasury token account to receive fees

errors.name: ContributionAlreadyMade
errors.msg: Contribution already made for this month

errors.name: PotAlreadyDistributed
errors.msg: Pot already distributed for this month

errors.name: CannotLeaveActivePeriod
errors.msg: Cannot leave circle during active period

errors.name: AutomationNotScheduled
errors.msg: Automation not scheduled at this time

errors.name: NotYourTurn
errors.msg: Not your turn to claim payout

fields.name: circle
docs: The circle this auction is for

fields.name: initiator
docs: The member who initiated the auction

fields.name: pot_amount
docs: Current month's pot amount being auctioned

fields.name: settled
docs: Whether the auction has been settled

fields.name: circle
docs: The circle this event relates to

fields.name: authority
docs: Authority that can update automation settings

fields.name: switchboard_queue
docs: Switchboard queue account for automation jobs

fields.name: min_interval
docs: Minimum interval between automation checks (in seconds)

fields.name: auction
docs: The auction this bid is for

fields.name: bidder_stake
docs: Bidder's stake at time of bid

fields.name: is_highest
docs: Whether this bid is currently the highest

fields.name: id
docs: The unique identifier for the circle

fields.name: duration_months
docs: Duration of the circle in months

fields.name: total_pot
docs: Total pot amount collected so far

fields.name: payout_bid_amounts
docs: Bid amounts corresponding to payout_queue entries (for auction-based payouts)

fields.name: min_trust_tier
docs: Minimum trust tier required to join

fields.name: circle
docs: The circle this automation belongs to

fields.name: job_account
docs: Switchboard job account for this circle

fields.name: circle
docs: The circle this escrow belongs to

fields.name: reflect_yield_earned
docs: Yield earned from Reflect price appreciation

fields.name: reflect_token_type
docs: Reflect token type used (USDC+ or USDJ)

fields.name: execution_threshold
docs: Minimum voting power required for execution

fields.name: total_voting_power
docs: Total voting power for this proposal

fields.name: votes_for
docs: Total votes in favor (raw vote count)

fields.name: new_interest_rate
docs: New interest rate (for interest rate proposals)

fields.name: circle
docs: The circle this insurance pool belongs to

fields.name: total_staked
docs: Total amount staked by all members

fields.name: circle
docs: The circle this member belongs to

fields.name: has_received_pot
docs: Whether this member has received the pot

fields.name: trust_score
docs: Current trust score (cached for quick access)

fields.name: contributions_missed
docs: Number of contributions missed in this circle

types.name: RevenueParams
docs: Revenue parameters that can be adjusted by governance

fields.name: distribution_fee_rate
docs: Distribution fee rate in basis points (default: 50 = 0.5%)

fields.name: yield_fee_rate
docs: Yield fee rate in basis points (default: 25 = 0.25%)

fields.name: management_fee_rate
docs: Annual management fee rate in basis points (default: 200 = 2%)

fields.name: management_fee_interval
docs: Minimum interval between management fee collections (seconds)

types.name: RevenueReport
docs: Revenue report structure for tracking and analytics

fields.name: total_period_fees
docs: Total fees collected in this period

fields.name: active_circles
docs: Number of circles active in this period

fields.name: total_distributions
docs: Total amount distributed in this period

fields.name: total_yield
docs: Total yield generated in this period

fields.name: total_managed_stake
docs: Total stake amount subject to management fees

fields.name: proof_type
docs: Type of social proof (Twitter, Discord, etc.)

types.name: Treasury
docs: Global treasury account that holds all protocol fees

fields.name: authority
docs: Authority that can manage treasury (should be governance)

fields.name: total_fees_collected
docs: Total fees collected across all categories

fields.name: management_fees
docs: Management fees from staked amounts (2% annual)

fields.name: last_management_fee_collection
docs: Last time management fees were collected

fields.name: total_contributions
docs: Total contributions made across all circles

fields.name: social_proofs
docs: Social proofs attached to this user

fields.name: last_updated
docs: Last time trust score was updated

fields.name: proposal
docs: The proposal this vote is for

fields.name: quadratic_weight
docs: Quadratic voting weight (square root of voting power)
